channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
channel.description:
#The Forgotten
[Neutral] [Killer]
{Illusive}(Passive) - [Immune to Occupation and target changing. Will not appear Occupy Immune to other players. Your visits will also be hidden from Other players at night.]
{Odd Familiarity}(Passive) - [For the first 3 Night's appears to be Blue Dragon and Social]
{Lapse Memory}(Day) - [Change a Marked Players vote] - [3] Uses
{Exert Presence}(Day) - [Your visit tonight will be able to be seen by other players.] - [3] Uses
{Mark Player}(Night) - [Marks a target player. Within two nights the player will die. You will hear whispers to and from that player.] - [Infinite.] Uses
{Mind Collapse}(Night) - [Clear a Marked players Log and Chat. Gain a copy of that player's logs.] - [2] Uses
Your objective is to [see all members of the main faction killed.]

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
This seems really weak. It takes 2 nights to take effect, and unseen could kill them in that time. I think the game is cluttered enough with occupy immune classes, which are everywhere. The voting powers are cool. Exert Presence seems weak, since you are giving BD info. Mind Collapse is weird, since you just need a good memory to counter it. The Snoop element of it works I think, but probably needs some other property to make it worth it,

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: Fernando
item.description:
I was maybe thinking of giving it 2 extra lives. Unlike the Reaper which can replenish it… However the old fashioned Death Immunity might be added.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: Okx
item.description:
So, how is this NK going to survive attacks on itself?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: Fernando
item.description:
Aight so it doesn’t clear Secret notes but gives you a copy of that players Logs. Also you’ll be able to hear Marked players Whispers. This way they’ll be able to reliably claim Noble.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The point of secret notes is to be the in game equivalent of having an actual notepad that no one in game could possibly get to. Your suggestion ruins that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: Fernando
item.description:
The point of removing the Secret notes is so that players cannot store their logs in there. However I would like to further discuss as maybe a countermeasure to Mind Collapse.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Forgotten
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Fernando:

and Secret notes.

Umm… No. The whole point of secret notes is that they mean you don’t need an out of game notepad for things like these. If they are not tamperproof then no one will use it.

Read full topic

players. Your visits will also be hidden from Other players at night.]
